designformats.specctra

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • designformats.specctra.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Path, Polygon, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a shape in a Specctra dsn file.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    alfons

      • read_scope

        public static final Shape read_scope(Scanner p_scanner,
                                     LayerStructure p_layer_structure)
        Reads shape scope from a Specctra dsn file. If p_layer_structure == null, only Layer.PCB and Layer.Signal are expected, no induvidual layers.
        Parameters:
        p_scanner - a Scanner object.
        p_layer_structure - a LayerStructure object.
        Returns:
        a Shape object.

      • read_area_scope

        public static final designformats.specctra.Shape.ReadAreaScopeResult read_area_scope(Scanner p_scanner,
                                                                                     LayerStructure p_layer_structure,
                                                                                     boolean p_skip_window_scopes)
        Reads a shape , which may contain holes from a specctra dsn-file. The first shape in the shape_list of the result is the border of the area. The other shapes in the shape_list are holes (windows).
        Parameters:
        p_scanner - a Scanner object.
        p_layer_structure - a LayerStructure object.
        p_skip_window_scopes - a boolean.
        Returns:
        a Shape.ReadAreaScopeResult object.

      • read_rectangle_scope

        public static Rectangle read_rectangle_scope(Scanner p_scanner,
                                             LayerStructure p_layer_structure)
        Reads a rectangle scope from a Specctra dsn file. If p_layer_structure == null, only Layer.PCB and Layer.Signal are expected, no induvidual layers.
        Parameters:
        p_scanner - a Scanner object.
        p_layer_structure - a LayerStructure object.
        Returns:
        a Rectangle object.

      • read_polygon_scope

      • transform_area_to_board

        public static Area transform_area_to_board(java.util.Collection<Shape> p_area,
                                           CoordinateTransform p_coordinate_transform)
        Transforms a shape with holes to the board coordinate system. The first shape in the Collection p_area is the border, the other shapes are holes of the area.
        Parameters:
        p_area - a java$util$Collection object.
        p_coordinate_transform - a CoordinateTransform object.
        Returns:
        a Area object.

      • transform_area_to_board_rel

        public static Area transform_area_to_board_rel(java.util.Collection<Shape> p_area,
                                               CoordinateTransform p_coordinate_transform)
        Transforms the relative coordinates of a shape with holes to the board coordinate system. The first shape in the Collection p_area is the border, the other shapes are holes of the area.
        Parameters:
        p_area - a java$util$Collection object.
        p_coordinate_transform - a CoordinateTransform object.
        Returns:
        a Area object.
